title: Fin
description: Master Sergeant Rhonda Chase loves her career in Max Impact, a part of the United States Air Force band. People laugh when they find out she’s a singer in the Air Force and she may not fight for her country, but she’s damn proud of her military service.Captain Fin (Finley) O’Malley bitched and moaned about flying dignitaries into a militarized zone that is until he met Rhonda. Petite, blond and just his type. When she turns him down flat, he has no time to be upset. A group of insurgents bombed the compound where Max Impact is performing.Forced into the line of fire, Rhonda must hold strong. Against the rising danger and passion the two might just find love.
author: Jambrea Jo Jones
